name: SHRIRAM NEURO-SPINE & SKIN CENTRE
description: SHRIRAM NEURO-SPINE & SKIN CENTRE is a leading specialty healthcare centre with a strong reputation for excellence in neuro, spine, and dermatological care. Our experienced doctors and advanced medical technology ensure that every patient receives personalized, high-quality treatment in a compassionate and professional environment.

hero.title: Your Health, Our Priority
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class healthcare with our team of expert doctors and cutting-edge medical technology.

services.title: Spine Care
services.description: Comprehensive treatment for back and neck pain, slipped disc, sciatica, and spinal injuries with advanced surgical and non-surgical options.

services.title: Neurology
services.description: Expert care for brain, nerve, and neurological disorders including stroke, epilepsy, migraine, and neuropathies.

services.title: Dermatology
services.description: Advanced skin care for acne, eczema, pigmentation, hair loss, and other dermatological conditions.

services.title: Neuro-Rehabilitation
services.description: Personalized neuro-physiotherapy and rehabilitation programs for patients recovering from neurological and spinal conditions.

services.title: Cosmetic Dermatology
services.description: Skin rejuvenation, laser treatments, anti-aging solutions, and cosmetic procedures for improved appearance and confidence.

services.title: Diagnostics & Imaging
services.description: High-precision diagnostics including MRI, CT scan, EMG/NCV, skin biopsy, and other advanced tests.

testimonials.name: Shivam Pandey
testimonials.review: Dr . Snehlata mam it's my personal experience what I had got by there .I so thankful to Snehlata mam she having a very fine working skills in her surgery ,treatment , consultant and very helpful nature and also thanks to hospital staff for good behaviour and gesture

testimonials.name: Disha Yadav
testimonials.review: Better treatment and good facilities.Doctor like a friend No any rude behaviour with staffs by doctor

testimonials.name: Dr. Amit Sharma
testimonials.review: As a fellow physician, I can confidently say this hospital maintains the highest standards of medical care and patient safety.

contact.address: D-11, Ganj, SA-10/15, near Thai Temple(Standing Buddha statue, Sarnath, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221007
